Title: greatest
Description: Returns the greatest across a list of values.  All of the list members must be of comparable types.
Examples: SELECT greatest(1, 2, toUInt8(3), 3.) result,  toTypeName(result) type;
EffectiveSQLsRefined: SELECT greatest(1, 2, toUInt8(3), 3.) result,  toTypeName(result) type;
